name: Bain Marie
description: A mysterious liquid kept in a jar that can only be bought from mystical maidens of the highest mountains for a hefty price.

name: Cheese
description: White cheese of an unknown origin that gives of a strong, foul odor, but has effective antibacterial properties.

name: Bigfoot's Footskin
description: Footskin shaved from the legend that has a weirdly calming scent. It has a distinct flavor and can be brewed as tea for male vigor.

name: Sandman's Crust
description: Eye gunk collected from the man himself. This dust is used to help insomniacs sleep.

name: Goblin's Booger
description: Dried mucus with dust particles and hair that emanates a mysterious green light in the dark.

name: Ectoplasm
description: A green, gooey, magical gel that is disgusting and sticky.
